https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9RPhNbPqd7GQFxS0W3z5KcelHFO.jpg A titillating teen comedy, a young surfer and his friends head to Costa Rica to save his beautiful aunt's beach motel, resurrect an old surf champion and find enough waves and women to make for a totally tasty time. Costa Rican Summer
